title: Ekaterinaaaa
author: Ekaterinaaaa
content: I had been worrying all along if it would take until September or even longer to arrive. Every day, I was filled with concerns, but good luck always favors us. Now, I can start doing things that bring happiness. It seems like just a month ago I was going crazy with anticipation, but receiving the equipment this quickly has surprised me. Wish me luck! I will share what happens next here.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: How much did you pay for ASIC with delivery?Take some photos.https://www.asicminervalue.com/miners/bitmain/antminer-ks3-8-3thNow the profit drops by an average of 30 dollars a day, but I am sure that you can win with such mining. Good luck to you. But now these ASICs are already dangerous to order.

comments.author: sxemini
comments.body: Quote from: Ekaterinaaaa on August 09, 2023, 03:52:14 AMI had been worrying all along if it would take until September or even longer to arrive. Every day, I was filled with concerns, but good luck always favors us. Now, I can start doing things that bring happiness. It seems like just a month ago I was going crazy with anticipation, but receiving the equipment this quickly has surprised me. Wish me luck! I will share what happens next here.You bought an KS3 for 50000? Sorry but you will loose a loooooot of money. I expect over 100PH in the Kaspa network until the end of this year.

I expect over 100PH in the Kaspa network until the end of this year.Profit in the next 30 days will be the most important for the payback of this ASIC. If the Esik brings about $30,000 in profit in the first month, then this is a good indicator.

Moreover, my 10 KS0 machines were delivered today, and the supplier is currently helping me with the shipment to my location.

comments.body: Quote from: Ekaterinaaaa on August 10, 2023, 03:51:37 AMQuote from: FP91G on August 09, 2023, 11:44:50 AMHow much did you pay for ASIC with delivery?Take some photos.https://www.asicminervalue.com/miners/bitmain/antminer-ks3-8-3thNow the profit drops by an average of 30 dollars a day, but I am sure that you can win with such mining. Good luck to you. But now these ASICs are already dangerous to order.I paid $44000, yes, it's dropping every day, but I still think it's profitable.That's an odd definition of profitable. Profit only happens after you've paid back the 44K, until then you're recovering losses.Unless you have a crystal ball that can predict the future you can't know now if it will ever be profitable.

comments.body: Quote from: Ekaterinaaaa on August 10, 2023, 04:03:37 AMQuote from: FP91G on August 09, 2023, 12:55:57 PMQuote from: sxemini on August 09, 2023, 12:41:35 PMQuote from: Ekaterinaaaa on August 09, 2023, 03:52:14 AMI had been worrying all along if it would take until September or even longer to arrive. I expect over 100PH in the Kaspa network until the end of this year.Profit in the next 30 days will be the most important for the payback of this ASIC. If the Esik brings about $30,000 in profit in the first month, then this is a good indicator.No, I spent $44,000, and I don't believe there will be any losses. It's even potentially profitable. Moreover, my 10 KS0 machines were delivered today, and the supplier is currently helping me with the shipment to my location.You shouldn't get too carried away with this. This highly profitable mining will end soon, because ASIC manufacturers are likely to buy back miners' coins in order to maintain the price of the coin. When they stop doing this, the profit of miners will fall rapidly.

comments.body: Quote from: Ekaterinaaaa on August 10, 2023, 04:03:37 AMQuote from: FP91G on August 09, 2023, 12:55:57 PMQuote from: sxemini on August 09, 2023, 12:41:35 PMQuote from: Ekaterinaaaa on August 09, 2023, 03:52:14 AMI had been worrying all along if it would take until September or even longer to arrive. Every day, I was filled with concerns, but good luck always favors us. Now, I can start doing things that bring happiness. If the Esik brings about $30,000 in profit in the first month, then this is a good indicator.No, I spent $44,000, and I don't believe there will be any losses. It's even potentially profitable. Moreover, my 10 KS0 machines were delivered today, and the supplier is currently helping me with the shipment to my location.Ok and 44000 is much better than 50000? Men i am so sorry for you loose and i don´t understand why you ignore our warnings. The KS3 will fall to $50 a day -> makes a cashback time without power of over 3 years, but sure it will be much more with the common raising difficulty. KS0 is doing $4 a day or less, so cashback time is over 200 Days and the difficulty will raise 10x from this now, so a cashback time of 2000 days for your KS0.Did you really understand what you are doing? I saw a millionaire investing $40 million in a mining farm before the merge -> they earned 5 millions until today and now he is selling all with a total loose of over $30 - 35 Million Dollars -> he also thinked he do a smart move.Just my 2 cents.
